java.lang.Object
  org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.jgroups.JGroupsBackendQueueProcessorFactory

BackendQueueProcessorFactory, UpdatableBackendQueueProcessorFactory

MasterJGroupsBackendQueueProcessorFactory, SlaveJGroupsBackendQueueProcessorFactory

extends Object
implements UpdatableBackendQueueProcessorFactory

Common base class for Master and Slave BackendQueueProcessorFactories
